sentences.english: I had never seen such a long waiting-line.
sentences.chinese: 我从来没有看见如此的人龙。

sentences.english: The queues snaked around the airport and back to where they had started.
sentences.chinese: 排队的人龙环着机场回到了起点处。

sentences.english: Joined the long queue to get on board.
sentences.chinese: 长长的朝圣人龙正缓缓地移动著。

definition: Helong county level city in Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture 延邊朝鮮族自治州|延边朝鲜族自治州, Jilin
Shilong district of Pingdingshan city 平頂山市|平顶山市[Ping2 ding3 shan1 shi4], Henan
outstanding people/water and fire (in Daoist writing)

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
allosaurus/also written 異特龍|异特龙
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
